text: ee mune mokakdo purudu gathiyak thiyenawa kiyala mata danuna.

hambanthotata eha mayime thangalla paà·Šradeshiya sabha sabhapathiwaraya, 2011 desambar 25wanida rathaà·Šriye, giniawida raugath bimath kandayamak samaga ekwi bià·Šrathanya jathika tharunayaku kapakota maradama, ohuge pemwathiya ranchugasi dushanaya kaleda me deshapalana hayiya ganama thibunu sithima ha wishwasaya nisaya.

ema nisa thambiya yanuwen aamanthranaya kawuru ho kalabala nowiya yuthu deyaki ee aamanthranaya ma mage pasal kalaya aawarjanaya karami ma gnyanodaye igena ganna wita mage malli igena gaththe muslim pasale ya.bauddha pasalak wu nisa islam wishaya thibune natha .ee nisa mamada buddha dharmaya wishayak lesa hadaruwemi.
(sipetko mila rupiyal 145)

ma hata karannata deyak nomatha.....ma ketharam uthsaha gaththada eya sarthakathathwayakata genayamata nohaki wiya.kese wethath kawada ho me game sama ayekutama ee pilibada watahimak ena dinaya wanawita eya pramadayata karanak wi hamaraya .....ma sithin kanagatuwata path wuwada ma kedinakaho meya itukarana bawa eda sitha gath aakarayatama 2015 janawari masa 22 wana dina mage panasthuwana upandinaya dina sihi karamin thibbotugoda gamini widuhal aadi shishya sangamaya aarambha kirima sadaha postar gasimata thiranata karamin postarayak nirmanaya kara gama pura alawimata kriya karana ladi.
eya antharjathika washayen da piligath prathipaththiyaki.
me fon eke nimawa lassanayi..ee wagema batariyath hariyatama dawasak thiyenawa deta onkarala thibunath..

prawina ha prathibhapurna nirmana karuwan kisidinaka ohuta awasthawak nodimada eyata hethu wuwa wiya hakiya.

epamanak nowa katharagama basnayaka nilame thanathurata chandaya laba dimata balaya athi monaragala disthrikkaye siyaluma pansal aramunu karagena aasiyanu madhya jalaya haraha renoda silwa me wanawita meheyum diyath kara athi athara me haraha koti gananin mudal me siyaluma pansal walata pompa kirimatath ema siyaluma wiharadhipathi swamin wahansela menma dayaka sabhawe lokkantada wiwidhakara thutu paduru laba dimatath renoda silwa kriyakaramin sitina bawa me wanawita anawaranaya wi thibe.

mata me rata epa , me kramaya epa, mata oone 2012 thibuna rata, ara sudu wan ena , minisun biyen hangawena , saranala kappam ganna , anunge idam gewal alla ganna , marwinla minisun gas bandina , deshapalakayo nidan harana , kadu horakam karana, deshapalakayanta pandam allana niladhari inna , unta gotta alla jiwath wena janamadhya karayo inna , ara yakada hora , dumindala nirupadrithawa inna , polisiyen asaranayange atakatu kadana, pujakayo , bhikshun , pusarila lamayi ,kanthawo apayojanaya karana , eluwo marana , thana thana kunu dana , bulath kela gahana, bas wala asahanaya pirunu jak karayo inna , elo sihiyak nathiwa kamathi kamathi widiyata wahana elawana riyaduran inna , wishwa widyala sisunge oluwata kompiyutar monitar walin gahana , nawakayan niruwath karana, wishwa widyala aacharyawaru sathiyata paya dekak thunak uganwa boruwa karana , ithiyopiyawa samaga karata kara satanak dena wishwa widyala thiyana , en ji oo salli , demala dayasporawe salli walin yapena manawawadin inna , jathiwadaya , gothrawadaya thiyana , udghoshana waladi gini thiyaganna, marenakam upawasa karanawa kiyana sangaruwana inna , koti samaga dil dana fadar la inna , minisun trolar wala batahira rata walata pala yana ara lassana gunawath uthum rata mata oone.
